content.1: The burden of Moab. Because in the night Ar of Moab is laid waste,
content.2: He is gone up to Bajith, and to Dibon, the high places, to weep: Moab shall howl over Nebo, and over Medeba: on all their heads
content.3: In their streets they shall gird themselves with sackcloth: on the tops of their houses, and in their streets, every one shall howl, weeping abundantly.
content.4: And Heshbon shall cry, and Elealeh: their voice shall be heard
content.5: My heart shall cry out for Moab; his fugitives
content.6: For the waters of Nimrim shall be desolate: for the hay is withered away, the grass faileth, there is no green thing.
content.7: Therefore the abundance they have gotten, and that which they have laid up, shall they carry away to the brook of the willows.
content.8: For the cry is gone round about the borders of Moab; the howling thereof unto Eglaim, and the howling thereof unto Beer-elim.
content.9: For the waters of Dimon shall be full of blood: for I will bring more upon Dimon, lions upon him that escapeth of Moab, and upon the remnant of the land.
